name: Amine Mhedhbi
content: Amine MhedhbiAmine Mhedhbiamine.mhedhbi@polymtl.caPavillon Lassonde, M-4119+1(514)-340-4711 Ext.3779Mailing addressPavillon Lassonde, M-4405Montr√©al, QC H3T 1J4I am an Assistant Professor at Polytechnique Montr√©al, the engineering school of Universit√© de Montr√©al. I am an associate academic member of Mila (Qu√©bec AI Institute) and IVADO (Data Valorisation Institute). I hold an FRQ-IVADO research chair in multimodal data engineering. I also serve as a technical advisor to some companies.My research spans all aspects of data and information management and overlaps with the research communities: VLDB, ACM SIGMOD, IEEE TCDE, and CIDR. I focus on analytical and AI-driven data system architectures, e.g., Flock and previously GraphflowDB and its successor K√πzu.Earlier, I started the applied research team at Distyl AI helping to drive some of their earliest solutions for F500 enterprise workflows. Prior to that, I received my PhD from the School of Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. I also completed two research internships at Microsoft Research.NewsShow older newsSep 2025Awarded the FRQ-IVADO research chair in multimodal data engineering. The award is part of the robust, reasoning, and responsible (R3) AI initiative by IVADO.Apr 2025Received the NSERC Discovery Grant with the Discovery Launch Supplement for a research program on multimodal data systems.Jan 2025Presented the GenEdit system developed at Distyl AI at CIDR, Amsterdam, Netherlands.Jan 2025Visited CWI for a week thanks to Madelon's hospitality. Gave a talk titled "Imposing Declarativity on Analytical Semantic Applications".Dec 2024We presented two papers at TRL on "LLM routing for SQL generation" and "Schema Linking Analysis in the Age of Well-Reasoned Language Models".TeachingINF3710 - Files and DatabasesFall 2024, Fall 2025Introduction to relational database management systems: SQL, architecture, storage, query processing and optimization, transactions, and recovery.GroupAnas Dorbani (PhD)Sunny Yasser (PhD)Nour Shaheen (MSc, co-advised with Sarath Chandar)Mo Malekpour (MSc, co-advised with Foutse Khomh)Graduated studentsMohamed Riahi (MSc 2025, co-advised with Foutse Khomh)InternsArien Andalibi-Abadan (MEng 2025 ‚Üí Pometry)Raissa Oumarou Petitot (BEng 2025 ‚Üí Morgan Stanley)Skander Hannachi (BEng 2024 ‚Üí Uno Platform)PublicationsShow allRecent PublicationsBeyond Quacking: Deep Integration of Language Models and RAG into DuckDBAnas Dorbani, Sunny Yasser, Jimmy Lin, Amine MhedhbiVLDB (Demo) 2025BibTeXCodePosterGenEdit: Compounding Stages and Continuous Improvement to Tackle Text-to-SQL in the EnterpriseKarime Maamari, Connor Landy, Amine MhedhbiCIDR 2025BibTeXSemantic Commit: Helping Users Update Intent Specifications for AI Memory at ScalePriyan Vaithilingam, Munyeong Kim, Frida-Cecilia Acosta-Parenteau, Daniel Lee, Amine Mhedhbi, Elena L.
